properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:52AM CST until February 22 at 2:34AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Noxubee River At Macon
* until late Friday night.
* At  8:00 AM Monday the stage was 31.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue falling to near 28.0 feet
Wednesday and will fall below flood stage Friday night.
* Impact...At 31.0 feet...Agriculture flooding is occurring near the
river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 48 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until late Friday night
